=== Ubuntu CDs For Sharing ===
If you have Ubuntu / Kubuntu / Edubuntu CDs/DVDs to share, add your name to the table. Please take note of what's written below ''before'' you add your name to the table --

* Keep the list in alphabetical order of the ''city''
* Provide enough information so that somebody can get in touch with you
* Don't change the formatting of the table
* We are not responsible for the possible misuse of any personal data you provide here

NOTE: It is time for an overhaul of this page so that it is easy to find CD 1) in a city 2) For a distro 3) For an architecture. If you are adding entry in this table for first time then add according to new structure. If you are updating the entry make sure it is shifted to new structure.
